import styles from './myPage.module.scss' import TopNavBar from 'components/TopNavBar' import { PersonIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { userInfoState } from 'states/userInfo' import { useRecoil, useRecoilValue } from 'recoil' import { MouseEvent } from 'react' import store from 'store' import Toggle from './Toggle' import { cartStoreState, likeStoreState } from 'states/storeState' const User = () => { const userInfo = useRecoilValue(userInfoState) const setLikeStore = useRecoil(likeStoreState) const setCartStore = useRecoil(cartStoreState) const clickDeleteBtn = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset if (value === undefined) return store.set(value, []) const selectStoreList = { cartStore: setCartStore, likeStore: setLikeStore, }[value] selectStoreList([]) } return (
{userInfo.userName} ({userInfo.userId})

다크모드
) } export default User
